label: 元日
対訳語: the first day of the new year
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: the first day of the new year, when a variety of rituals were presided over by the tennō, such as the chōga and associated banquets. New year celebrations, long customary in China and the Korean peninsular kingdoms, became increasingly important at the Yamato court from Tenji's era onward. [天皇、朝賀、天智]
